body:
Hey folks,

From a Spack installed this morning

`spack install openssl@1.0.2j
`

Doesn't work. 1.0.1u works and is good enough for me, but 1.0.2j gets error 550. 

==> Fetching ftp://openssl.org/source/openssl-1.0.2j.tar.gz

curl: (78) RETR response: 550
==> Fetching from ftp://openssl.org/source/openssl-1.0.2j.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for openssl-1.0.2j-gv5uc2m3hf25ifay6rjputcvssgfvask

When I wget the attempted address.

No such file 'openssl-1.0.2j.tar.gz'.

Not a spack bug per se, but a lot uses OpenSSL, updating these would be helpful
title: OpenSSL's FTP reorg causing problems
